name.description: Name of the channel. This is a one-line human-readable description of the channel

description.description: Description of the channel. This is a one-line human-readable description of the channel

support.description: Support  Level provided by the vendor

requires.description: Channels that are required by this channel.

repositories.description: Maven repositories that contains all artifacts from this channel.

url.description: Base URL of the Maven repository.

streams.description: Streams of components that are provided by this channel

groupId.description: GroupId of the stream. It must be either a valid groupId (corresponding to a G of a Maven GAV) or the * character to represent any groupId

artifactId.description: ArtifactId of the stream. It must be either a valid artifactId (corresponding to a A of a Maven GAV) or the * character to represent any artifactId

version.description: Version of the stream. This must be either a single version or a list of comma-separated versions. Either this field or the versionPattern field must be set.

version-pattern.description: VersionPattern of the stream. This is a regular expression that matches any version from this stream. Either this field or the versionPattern field must be set.

resolve-with-local-cache.description: Whether the local cache from Maven must be checked to resolve the latest version of this stream.
